EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Your Interest In Our Fuel Card Programs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for speaking with me today. Per our discussion, I am forwarding information regarding the WEX Fleet One Partner Referral Program. It contains a brief summary of the major benefits offered to fleets by our value-added partners, when used in conjunction with the Fleet One Over The Road (OTR) program.
Please review the attached information and select the Partner whose program or services would prove the most beneficial for your fleet’s fueling requirements. As you will notice, this is a fantastic opportunity for maximizing your fuel savings by joining over 25,000 satisfied customers across the country.
After making your selection, please reply to this email with your selection partner name or return the form provided back to me either by fax or email {!User.Fax}; or mail to my attention at {!User.Street}, {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode}. We will handle all the details for you. Thank you for your interest in Fleet One. I look forward to assisting you.
National Association of Small Trucking Companies (NASTC)
NASTC is dedicated to helping small trucking companies control their costs through managed purchasing, analysis, consultation and advocacy. Our ultimate mission is to level the competitive playing field allowing our member companies to grow, prosper and remain a significant force in the transportation industry.
o Contact: Erik Lamb
o Phone: (800) 264-8580
o Email: Erik.Lamb@nastc.com
o Discounts: QPN Network

o Contact: Rick Albright
o Phone: (913) 310-1457
o Email: ralbright@rtscredit.com
o Discounts: TravelCenters of America, Petro Stopping Centers, Pilot Flying J
§ Discounts reflected at time of purchase or rebated
